module.name: MageSuite_Patches
module.description: Repository of Magento patches released by creativestyle to fix and improve Magento and 3rd party extensions.

entry.overview: Allow in elasticsuite to filter less than or equal range price
Patch for Wyomind data feed manager - fixes nested loops which cause performance issues.
Patch for AheadWorks declarative schema XML.
Firebear ImportExport - add store_id to review export.
Fix for magento/framework - Allow dot in query order's field validation process.
Allow group attribute on referenceBlock directive in layout files.
Allow group attribute on referenceBlock directive in layout files.
Disable saved address validation and template override.
Extend exisiting insing/magento2-module-postcore patch.
Set proper initial value to post-code input observable.
Add a dispatch event mollie_before_build_transaction_orders_api to handle additional fee from bulk goods.
Patch for Emarsys extension (do not submit empty values)
Updated constraint for ElasticSuite patch (it got fixed in native extension).
Forced enabling position field in the product attribute form.
Fixed line endings in Sendinblue module.
Added a dispatch event mollie_before_build_transaction_orders_api to handle additional fee from bulk goods.
Fix for scenario with failing tests when servername is not set.
Disable reindex of elasticsearch inside category_products indexer.
Fixes for wrong reindexPool indexers order.
Fix price config data to avoid JS error on PDP (related to price-box)
Fix tier prices-related JS issue (reference to not exsisting propery) in price-box
Remove validation for color in order to avoid loading tinycolor library
Fixes JS error with Amazon Pay and ThreeStepCheckout combination
Improves listing of files in GetDirectoryTree
Adds missing path value that is essential to edit a image
Add proper jquery event to trigger product video on touch devices
Fix missing js mage/validate dependency in form validation script
